text: Coraopolis is a borough in Allegheny County, Pennsylvania, United States. The population was 5,559 at the 2020 census. It is a small community located to the west of Pittsburgh, along the Ohio River and to the east of the Pittsburgh International Airport. The American Bridge Company is headquartered in Coraopolis. ==References== ==Other websites== *Borough website Category:Boroughs in Allegheny County, Pennsylvania
title: Coraopolis, Pennsylvania
